description: This stores comparison study data for externally performed procedures.

columns.name: ORDER_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the order record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: COMP_EXT_LINE
columns.description: The line number that corresponds with the patient's list of externally performed studies. Use it to join to the table PAT_IMG_EXT_PROCS on the LINE column.

columns.name: EXT_CHNG_AMT_C_NAME
columns.description:
The comparison studies amount of change category ID for the external procedure order in the COMP_EXT_LINE column.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


No Comparison


No Significant Change


Significant Change


Not Otherwise Specified
